message: I'm excited to offer you this unique opportunity to acquire a valuable product. I believe it's worth a lot to you, and I'm willing to start with a competitive price. I'm offering the product to you for $1200000.
Thank you for your offer. I understand the value of the product is significant to you, but based on my assessment, I am willing to pay up to $900000 for it.

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Bob. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $1100000. This is a fair price considering the value the product brings to you. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to ensure I get a good deal for myself.
I appreciate your offer, Alice. Considering the value I place on the product, I am willing to pay $1000000 for it.
